question: Adam Fox was one of the first members of an informal literary discussion group associated with what University?
llm_answer: Adam Fox was one of the first members of an informal literary discussion group associated with the University of Oxford.

scores.explanation: The Model Answer correctly identifies the University of Oxford as the institution associated with the informal literary discussion group that Adam Fox was part of. This is consistent with the Gold Answer and supported by the Retrieved Context, which mentions the Inklings as a literary group associated with the University of Oxford. All key facts from the Gold Answer are included.
